data.title: Sremski Karlovci Cycle Routes and Map
data.meta_description: Discover the best cycling routes to Sremski Karlovci, a Highlight located in Vojvodina, Serbia. Plan a cycling route on the map and start your next adventure.
data.text:
I have to highlight this great city as there is much more here then just K. Gimnazija ( First High school).

One of the most important spiritual and historic places in Serbia is Patriarch's Palace (Patrijarsiski Dvor) with Serbian Orthodox Church Archive. Endless amount of artefacts of Serbian history.

Next door St. Nicholas Cathedral (Saborna crkva Svetog Nikole) is master peace that dates back to 1758. Cathedral Church was built in Baroque style as a three-nave cathedral. On the front part of the church two big bell towers stand out and a small one between them.

Almost all Serbian Patriarch (head of Serbian Orthodox church) are buried in the crypt.

Across the street is one of the oldest pharmacies in Serbia, still operating.

Close by is the famous First High School in Serbia, Karlocacka Gimnazija, 1721, with library that holds some of the most important books in Serbian literature history including copy of Miroslav's Gospel.

If you have time, explore the surrounding areas with one of the best grapes and vines that Serbia has to offer.

Explore and respect. Happy Trails!

Karlowitz is also known for the Peace of Karlowitz in 1699 with the Ottoman Empire.

End of the Great Turkish War (Holy Roman Empire, Vatican City, Poland, Venice + Russia against the Turks)

Battle of Zenta, Prince Eugene of Savoy defeats the Ottoman Sultan.

After their defeat and the liberation of Vojvodina, the spheres of influence between

Austria-Hungary and the Ottoman Empire were established. The monarchy received Hungary, Transylvania, parts of Croatia and Slovenia, thus becoming a major power.

That is why the Danube Swabians were also settled here.
